Created attachment 28449
Patch

TarEntry class has useful fields like linkName and linkFlag that's not fully exposed. This patch fixes this problem.

You shouldn't be using Ant's tar classes but rather Commons Compress http://commons.apache.org/compress/ - which is what underlies the compress antlib rather than Ant's own tar package.

You can set the linkname in Commons Compress via a setter and the linkFlag via a constructor argument.
